import styles from './Card.module.css' import Prism from 'prismjs' import 'prismjs/themes/prism-custom.css' import { useEffect } from 'react' const Card = ({ title, description, src, alt }) => { useEffect(() => { Prism.highlightAll() }, []) return (

{title}

"{description}..."

          {description}
) } export default Card
